verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שָׁל֗וֹשׁ <WH7969> In the third לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <WH3566> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> a thing נִגְלָ֣ה <WH1540> was revealed לְדָֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> unto Daniel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֑ר <WH1095> Belteshazzar וֶאֱמֶ֤ת <WH571> [was] true הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> and the thing וְצָבָ֣א <WH6635> but the time appointed גָד֔וֹל <WH1419> [was] long וּבִין֙ <WH995> and he understood אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the thing וּבִ֥ינָה <WH998> and had understanding ל֖וֹ בַּמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> of the vision

בַּיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> those אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I דָֽנִיֵּאל֙ <WH1840> I Daniel הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> had been מִתְאַבֵּ֔ל <WH56> was mourning שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <WH7620> weeks יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> full

לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread חֲמֻד֞וֹת <WH2530> beauty לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אָכַ֗לְתִּי <WH398> I ate וּבָשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh וָיַ֛יִן <WH3196> nor wine לֹא־ <WH3808> nor בָ֥א <WH935> neither came אֶל־ <WH413> about פִּ֖י <WH6310> in my mouth וְס֣וֹךְ <WH5480> neither did I anoint לֹא־ <WH3808> nor סָ֑כְתִּי <WH5480> myself at all עַד־ <WH5704> until מְלֹ֕את <WH4390> were fulfilled שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> till three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <WH7620> weeks יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> whole פ

וּבְי֛וֹם <WH3117> day עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> And in the four לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> of the first וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I הָיִ֛יתִי <WH1961> become עַ֣ל <WH5921> was by יַ֧ד <WH3027> as I was by the side הַנָּהָ֛ר <WH5104> river הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of the great ה֥וּא <WH1931> that חִדָּֽקֶל׃ <WH2313> which [is] Hiddekel

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> Then I lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> mine eyes וָאֵ֔רֶא <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold אִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and behold a certain לָב֣וּשׁ <WH3847> clothed בַּדִּ֑ים <WH906> in linen וּמָתְנָ֥יו <WH4975> whose loins חֲגֻרִ֖ים <WH2296> [were] girded בְּכֶ֥תֶם <WH3800> with fine gold אוּפָֽז׃ <WH210> of Uphaz

וּגְוִיָּת֣וֹ <WH1472> His body כְתַרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <WH8658> also [was] like the beryl וּפָנָ֞יו <WH6440> and his face כְּמַרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> as the appearance בָרָק֙ <WH1300> of lightning וְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> and his eyes כְּלַפִּ֣ידֵי <WH3940> as lamps אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of fire וּזְרֹֽעֹתָיו֙ <WH2220> and his arms וּמַרְגְּלֹתָ֔יו <WH4772> and his feet כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> like in colour נְחֹ֣שֶׁת <WH5178> brass קָלָ֑ל <WH7044> to polished וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> and the voice דְּבָרָ֖יו <WH1697> of his words כְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> like the voice הָמֽוֹן׃ <WH1995> of a multitude

וְרָאִיתִי֩ <WH7200> alone saw אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I דָנִיֵּ֤אל <WH1840> And I Daniel לְבַדִּי֙ <WH905> alone אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְאָ֔ה <WH4759> the vision וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> for the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not רָא֖וּ <WH7200> that were with me saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְאָ֑ה <WH4759> not the vision אֲבָ֗ל <WH61> but חֲרָדָ֤ה <WH2731> quaking גְדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> a great נָפְלָ֣ה <WH5307> fell עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> on וַֽיִּבְרְח֖וּ <WH1272> upon them so that they fled בְּהֵחָבֵֽא׃ <WH2244> to hide

וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <WH7604> Therefore I was left alone לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> alone וָֽאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְאָ֤ה <WH4759> vision הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> this great הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> yet וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no נִשְׁאַר־ <WH7604> and there remained בִּ֖י כֹּ֑ח <WH3581> no strength וְהוֹדִ֗י <WH1935> in me for my comeliness נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <WH2015> was turned עָלַי֙ <WH5921> unto לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH4889> in me into corruption וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <WH6113> and I retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> no strength

וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> Yet heard אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> I the voice דְּבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> of his words וּכְשָׁמְעִי֙ <WH8085> and when I heard אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice דְּבָרָ֔יו <WH1697> of his words וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I הָיִ֛יתִי <WH1961> become נִרְדָּ֥ם <WH7290> then was I in a deep sleep עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> on my face וּפָנַ֥י <WH6440> and my face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> toward the ground

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold יָ֖ד <WH3027> And behold an hand נָ֣גְעָה <WH5060> touched בִּ֑י וַתְּנִיעֵ֥נִי <WH5128> me which set עַל־ <WH5921> and בִּרְכַּ֖י <WH1290> me upon my knees וְכַפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> and [upon] the palms יָדָֽי׃ <WH3027> of my hands

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֡י <WH413> to me דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1840> unto me O Daniel אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man חֲ֠מֻדוֹת <WH2530> beauty הָבֵ֨ן <WH995> understand בַּדְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> that אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> I am דֹבֵ֤ר <WH1696> that I speak אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> about וַעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> unto thee and stand עַל־ <WH5921> unto עָמְדֶ֔ךָ <WH5975> unto me I stood כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> have now שֻׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> for unto thee am I now sent אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you וּבְדַבְּר֥וֹ <WH1696> And when he had spoken עִמִּ֛י <WH5973> with אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this עָמַ֥דְתִּי <WH5975> and stand מַרְעִֽיד׃ <WH7460> trembling

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַי֮ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> he unto me Fear דָנִיֵּאל֒ <WH1840> not Daniel כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> for from the first אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you נָתַ֧תָּ <WH5414> that thou didst set אֶֽת־ <WH853> לִבְּךָ֛ <WH3820> thine heart לְהָבִ֧ין <WH995> to understand וּלְהִתְעַנּ֛וֹת <WH6031> and to chasten לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> thyself before אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> were heard דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1697> thy words וַאֲנִי־ <WH589> and I בָ֖אתִי <WH935> and I am come בִּדְבָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1697> for thy words

וְשַׂ֣ר ׀ <WH8269> But the prince מַלְכ֣וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom פָּרַ֗ס <WH6539> of Persia עֹמֵ֤ד <WH5975> withstood לְנֶגְדִּי֙ <WH5048> about עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twenty וְאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> me one י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold מִֽיכָאֵ֗ל <WH4317> but lo Michael אַחַ֛ד <WH259> one הַשָּׂרִ֥ים <WH8269> princes הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> of the chief בָּ֣א <WH935> came לְעָזְרֵ֑נִי <WH5826> to help וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I נוֹתַ֣רְתִּי <WH3498> me and I remained שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> there with מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> the kings פָרָֽס׃ <WH6539> of Persia

וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> Now I am come לַהֲבִ֣ינְךָ֔ <WH995> to make thee understand אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of what יִקְרָ֥ה <WH7136> what shall befall לְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> thy people בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> in the latter הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> days כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֥וֹד <WH5750> yet חָז֖וֹן <WH2377> for yet the vision לַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> [is] for [many] days

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <WH1696> And when he had spoken עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> such words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> to these נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> unto me I set פָנַ֛י <WH6440> my face אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> toward the ground וְנֶאֱלָֽמְתִּי׃ <WH481> and I became dumb

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> and behold כִּדְמוּת֙ <WH1823> And behold [one] like the similitude בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men נֹגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> touched עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפָתָ֑י <WH8193> my lips וָאֶפְתַּח־ <WH6605> then I opened פִּ֗י <WH6310> my mouth וָאֲדַבְּרָה֙ <WH1696> and spake וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to him הָעֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> unto him that stood לְנֶגְדִּ֔י <WH5048> before אֲדֹנִ֗י <WH113> before me O my lord בַּמַּרְאָה֙ <WH4759> by the vision נֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <WH2015> are turned צִירַי֙ <WH6735> my sorrows עָלַ֔י <WH5921> and וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <WH6113> upon me and I have retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> no strength

וְהֵ֣יךְ <WH1963> For how יוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> can עֶ֤בֶד <WH5650> the servant אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> of this my lord זֶ֔ה <WH2088> such לְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> talk עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲדֹ֣נִי <WH113> of my lord זֶ֑ה <WH2088> such וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> I מֵעַ֙תָּה֙ <WH6258> now לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַעֲמָד־ <WH5975> there remained בִּ֣י כֹ֔חַ <WH3581> no strength וּנְשָׁמָ֖ה <WH5397> in me neither is there breath לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor נִשְׁאֲרָה־ <WH7604> left בִֽי׃
וַיֹּ֧סֶף <WH3254> Then there came again וַיִּגַּע־ <WH5060> and touched בִּ֛י כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> me [one] like the appearance אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of a man וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽנִי׃ <WH2388> and he strengthened

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> And said אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֧א <WH3372> fear אִישׁ־ <WH376> O man חֲמֻד֛וֹת <WH2530> beauty שָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> not peace לָ֖ךְ חֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> [be] unto thee be strong וַחֲזָ֑ק <WH2388> yea be strong וּֽבְדַבְּר֤וֹ <WH1696> And when he had spoken עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> with הִתְחַזַּ֔קְתִּי <WH2388> unto me I was strengthened וָאֹ֥מְרָ֛ה <WH559> and said יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speak אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> Let my lord כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חִזַּקְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH2388> for thou hast strengthened

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Then said הֲיָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH3045> he Knowest לָמָּה־ <WH4100> why בָּ֣אתִי <WH935> thou wherefore I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> shall now אָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> unto thee? and now will I return לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight עִם־ <WH5973> against שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> with the prince פָּרָ֑ס <WH6539> of Persia וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יוֹצֵ֔א <WH3318> and when I am gone forth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold שַׂר־ <WH8269> lo the prince יָוָ֖ן <WH3120> of Grecia בָּֽא׃ <WH935> shall come

אֲבָל֙ <WH61> But אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> I will shew לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָשׁ֥וּם <WH7559> thee that which is noted בִּכְתָ֖ב <WH3791> in the scripture אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> of truth וְאֵ֨ין <WH369> there אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> and [there is] none מִתְחַזֵּ֤ק <WH2388> that holdeth עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> with עַל־ <WH5921> against אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo מִיכָאֵ֖ל <WH4317> with me in these things but Michael שַׂרְכֶֽם׃ <WH8269> your prince פ
